title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a project built using TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript to create a streamlined and modern voting application. This repository contains the source code for the application, focusing on providing a user-friendly and efficient platform for various voting scenarios.

title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep-debt-tracker is a project built with TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML to help users track and manage their sleep debt. This repository provides a platform to log sleep patterns, calculate sleep debt, and visualize progress towards a healthy sleep schedule. The project emphasizes clean code and modern web development practices, leveraging TypeScript for type safety and enhanced developer experience.

title: devboard
description: Devboard is a project management application built with Next.js 14, leveraging TypeScript for robust type safety and CSS for styling. Utilizing the Pages Router, it incorporates React Query for efficient data fetching and MUI for a polished user interface. This repository serves as a practical example of building a modern web application with these technologies and covers topics such as project structure, component design, and API integration.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: dynamic-event-calendar is a project showcasing a dynamic and interactive event calendar built using JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. This repository provides a functional and customizable calendar solution, perfect for displaying and managing events with a modern and user-friendly interface. It serves as a practical example of front-end web development techniques and can be easily adapted for various project needs.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: iot-asset-tracking is a web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase for real-time tracking and management of IoT assets. This project showcases a modern full-stack approach to asset tracking, utilizing serverless functions and a PostgreSQL database to provide a scalable and user-friendly interface for monitoring and controlling connected devices.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: Map-Visualisation is a project showcasing interactive map visualizations created using HTML for the frontend and Python for data processing and backend functionality (if applicable). This repository explores techniques for displaying and interacting with geographical data, providing a foundation for building custom mapping applications and data analysis tools. It serves as a learning resource and template for anyone interested in combining web technologies and geospatial data.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a CRUD application built using Python, Flask, and PostgreSQL, showcasing a practical project for managing data. It leverages HTML and CSS for the frontend, and Shell scripting for automation, demonstrating a full-stack approach to web development with an emphasis on Python-based solutions for common project needs.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository, built with Jupyter Notebooks and Python, contains various projects exploring financial analysis and modeling techniques. It covers topics such as portfolio optimization, time series analysis, and risk management, providing practical examples and code implementations for leveraging Python in the finance domain.

title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard repository is a project built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS to provide a dynamic and interactive interface for monitoring and controlling robotic fleets. This dashboard offers real-time data visualization, task management, and system health monitoring, making it an essential tool for managing and optimizing robotic operations.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool designed to visualize and analyze ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. Built using JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting, it provides a user-friendly interface for filtering, searching, and interpreting ROS logs, aiding in debugging and understanding robot behavior within the scope of a larger project.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next-idea-board is a project built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript to provide a dynamic and collaborative platform for brainstorming, organizing, and prioritizing ideas. This interactive idea board allows users to easily capture thoughts, categorize them, and track their progress, making it an ideal tool for project planning and innovation management.

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a project built with TypeScript, CSS, JavaScript, HTML, Express.js, and Vite.js that leverages the Gemini API. This repository serves as a learning project exploring modern web development techniques and the integration of AI APIs within a web application.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project showcasing a responsive and interactive dashboard built using Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. It serves as a practical example of modern web development techniques and best practices, demonstrating how to structure a robust user interface with data visualization and user management capabilities, and is focused on providing a functional dashboard experience.

title: resume
description: This repository contains my resume, crafted using LaTeX for a clean and professional look. The compiled PDF is also served as a simple HTML page for easy online accessibility. This project showcases my skills and experience in a visually appealing and readily distributable format, demonstrating proficiency in both document preparation and basic web presentation.
